title: Garfield Kart (PC) 2013 [ENG] Foxy Games
description:
Game Description:
******************
Join Garfield and his friends in the funniest fast and fur-ious game!
What character do you want to play with? Garfield, Odie, Jon, NermalÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ you choose! Take part in no-holds-barred crazy races in either multiplayer mode or against the computer!

Use your best driving skills and the bonus objects to be first across the finish line! But watch outÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a free-for-all out there!

Game Features:
***************
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 16 DIFFERENT CIRCUITS Ã¢â‚¬â€ stunning 3D environments from the world of Garfield (Garfield's neighborhood, the city, the Mally supermarket, the sunny farm, the misty docks, the oasis, the dark manor house, etc.)
